subject: Re: [junit] Per test fixture?
msgSnippet: That s right--at the beginning of the method. David Saff
messageBody:
That's right--at the beginning of the method.

David Saff

On Mon, Mar 8, 2010 at 7:07 AM, David Balažic <xerces9@...> wrote:
> Hi!
>
> What is the recommended way to setup test data for one test method
> only? Just do it at the beginning of the test method?
>
> Example:
>
> public void setUp()
> {
>  // common setup
> }
>
>
> public void testOne()
> {
>  setUpForTest1(); // stuff only needed for this test
>
>  // do the testing 1....
> }
>
> public void testTwo()
> {
>  setUpForTest2();
>
>  // do the testing 2....
> }
>
>
> Or is there special support from JUnit for this?
>
> Regards,
> David
>
>
> ------------------------------------
